rules.name: If_any_field_is_populated
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 8) OR ( 2 AND 7) OR ( 3 AND 10 ) OR ( 4 AND 9 ) OR (5 AND 6 ) )AND 11
rules.label: If any field is populated

fields.name: WelcomeName
fields.fieldText: Welcome {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}

fields.name: ProgressBarHeader
fields.fieldText: Before you can enter the portal, you need to set your preferences:

fields.name: FormattingPreferences
fields.fieldText: Formatting Preferences

fields.name: LocaleText
fields.fieldText: What is your locale (Language and Country)? It will determine language, location, date and number formatting.

fields.name: TimezoneText
fields.fieldText: What is your timezone?

fields.name: PersonalPreferences
fields.fieldText: ﻿Personal Preferences

fields.name: What_name_would_you_like_us_to_use_when_addressing_you
fields.fieldText: What name would you like us to use when addressing you? i.e. 'Hello Bob!' vs 'Hello Bob Smith'

fields.name: NotificationPreferences
fields.fieldText:
Notification Preferences

You are currently receiving notifications at: {!$User.Email}. If you update your email address below, you will receive an email with a link asking you to confirm the change. After confirmation, your email address change will be complete.

fields.name: AdditionalEmailChoice
fields.fieldText: Would you like to change the email address on your account?

fields.name: I_agree_to_share_my_email_with_my_employer
fields.fieldText: I agree to share my email with my employer

fields.name: Would_you_Like_to_share_your_Information_with_employee
fields.fieldText: Would you Like to share your Information with employee?

fields.fieldText: Do you want to share Mobile?

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_share_Primary_Email
fields.fieldText: Do you want to share Primary Email?

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_share_Phone
fields.fieldText: Do you want to share Phone?

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_share_Secondary_Email
fields.fieldText: Do you want to share Secondary Email?

fields.fieldText: Want to fill spouse information?

fields.fieldText: Spouse Information

value.stringValue: Enter the full phone number in local format, starting with the country code (e.g., +49 151 12345678).
